General.Name: S&S Healthcare Holding Ltd.
General.Description: S&S Healthcare Holding Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily focuses on the research and development, manufacture, and sale of medical imaging devices in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It also develops digital diagnostic X-ray systems; and researches, develops, and produces bone densitometry and body composition assessment products. The company was formerly known as Swissray Global Healthcare Holding Ltd. S&S Healthcare Holding Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
